snippet.title: Why Hasn’t Amber Heard Donated to Promised Charities Yet? | Splash News TV
snippet.description:
Why hasn’t Amber Heard donated any of her $7 million dollar settlement from Johnny Depp to the charities she promised to donate to yet? She can’t believe that no one would double-check that, could she? 

Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

Did Amber Heard seriously think no one would look into this? 

Remember when Amber made a statement saying that she would donate the $7 million dollars she won in her divorce settlement with Johnny Depp to Children’s Hospital and the ACLU? Well according to TMZ, the charities haven’t seen a dime. 

In more than 3 months, Amber is still apparently sitting on the money… 

But honestly, if donations to these charities are traceable, then Amber can’t be so stupid as to believe no one would double check her offers? Right? There’s no way. 

According to TMZ, the final settlement documents haven’t been signed yet, so maybe Amber doesn’t have the funds to donate yet. 

Also, Depp reportedly said that he wanted to donate the funds to the charities for her, but she’s trying to prohibit that because she doesn’t want him to get the tax reduction. 

Regardless, things remain messy between Amber and Johnny, but hopefully charities won’t have to lose out because of it.
